arts.ttl: Vini Jr. to miss two games after Valencia red card
arts.sum: Vinícius Júnior will be available for Real Madrid's Spanish Super Cup campaign after being handed a two-game domestic ban by the RFEF for his red card in the 2-1 win over Valencia last Friday.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid allege racial abuse against Vinicius Junior during Valencia clash
arts.sum: Real Madrid star Vinicius Junior was sent off against Valencia for the second time in three years at Mestalla on Friday night, with the first encounter greatly marred by racial abuse suffered by the Brazilian. Now the club channel for Los Blancos has found footage where it appears he has suffered further racism. Vinicius was […] The post Real Madrid allege racial abuse against Vinicius Junior during Valencia clash appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Mexico's Raul Jimenez Makes Premier League History Surpassing Manchester United Striker
arts.sum: Raul Jimenez became the highest scoring Mexican player in Premier League history, surpassing Javier "Chicharito" Hernandez.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid want Vinícius Jr. to face no ban for red card vs Valencia
arts.sum: The brass at La Liga giants Real Madrid are ready to launch an appeal, to have any punishment handed down to star winger Vinícius Jr. for his recent red card…

arts.ttl: Enzo Barrenechea targeted for fresh transfer – Aston Villa midfielder subject of January chat
arts.sum: In the last summer transfer window, Aston Villa loaned out Enzo Barrenechea to Valencia right after the midfielder had arrived from Juventus. The 23-year-old has played 13 games in La Liga and has picked up some experience. He was called up to the Argentine national squad back in November, but that was an odd situation The post Enzo Barrenechea targeted for fresh transfer – Aston Villa midfielder subject of January chat appeared first on Sport Witness.

arts.ttl: Watch: Kylian Mbappé may have saved Vinícius Jr. from a more lengthy ban for red card vs Valencia
arts.sum: Footage of Real Madrid star Kylian Mbappé has piqued widespread attentions across the club’s fanbase this weekend. As much comes after the Frenchman played an important part in assuring that…
